title: India Is Losing a Green-Energy Subsidy Race
author: Phred Dvorak
description: Huge green subsidies from wealthy countries could slow climate progress for some of the world's biggest carbon emitters by drawing away badly needed resources.
cleaned_text: Updated Sept. 1, 2023 12:02 am ET When U.S. [solar-manufacturing startup](https://www.wsj.com/articles/a-u-s-startups-15-year-struggle-to-survive-chinas-solar-grip-e964f3d1?mod=article_inline) CubicPV was looking for a place to locate its first factory a couple of years ago, India seemed a good choice.
